name: ai-sdk-chat-workspace
description: Monorepo for AI SDK Chat library and demo

scripts.rebuild:lib: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap clean && pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap build
scripts.rebuild:demo: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap-demo clean && pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap-demo build
scripts.release:patch: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prerelease: pnpm --filter ai-chat-bootstrap version prerelease --preid beta && git push && git push --tags
